pullRequest.title: Update to Firebase Crashlytics SDK
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-7749

Migrate to Firebase Crashlytics SDK.
Remove Fabric Answer Analytics that moved Firebase Analytics and we already integrated Firebase analytics
Update firebase-messaging lib to v20.2.0 in support of Firebase Crashlytics.
Resolve firebase library conflicts.
Update Test cases related after removing the fabric configs

Ref: https://firebase.google.com/docs/crashlytics/upgrade-sdk?platform=android
Old Config
FABRIC:
    ENABLED: true
    FABRIC_KEY: 'fabric_key'
    FABRIC_BUILD_SECRET: 'fabric_secret'
    KITS:
        CRASHLYTICS: true
        ANSWERS: true
        BRANCH:
                ENABLED: true
                BRANCH_KEY: 'branch_key'
                BRANCH_SECRET: 'branch_secret'

New Config
BRANCH:
    ENABLED: true
    KEY: 'branch_key'
    SECRET: 'branch_secret'

Config PR: edx/edx-mobile-config#105

  Firebase Crashlytics should work.
  All firebase kits (InAppMessaging, Analytics, Performance, Messaging) should work as they were working before.
  Branch.io should be working.

commit.message:
Update code to Firebase Crashlytics SDK

- LEARNER-7749
- Migrate to Firebase Crashlytics SDK.
- Remove Fabric Answer Analytics.
- Update firebase-messaging lib to v20.2.0 in support of Firebase Crashlytics.
- Resolve firebase library conflicts.
- Update Test cases related after removing the fabric configs

Ref: https://firebase.google.com/docs/crashlytics/upgrade-sdk?platform=android

nodes.bodyText: Please remove KITS, CRASHLYTICS, ANSWER as well
